name: Wirez Kit
description:
Wirez Kit is a wireframe component library for Slack apps.


Based on Block Kit, Slackâ€™s native UI framework, Wirez Kit helps you easily mock up and explore multiple Slack workflows right in Figma.




What you get: Slack desktop app mockup (with modals), 16 components, including buttons, text fields and checkboxes, as well as 10 message templates.


For more details visit https://github.com/piotrbakker/wirezkit
